sentence.Network_en: He was confused, painfully conscious of his inarticulateness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被弄糊涂了, 痛苦地觉得自己讲得真的语无伦次.

sentence.Network_en: He broke off lamely. He was confused, painfully conscious of his inarticulateness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他讪讪地住了嘴,但方寸已乱, 因为自己笨嘴拙舌很感到难为情.
